name: Computer Science Fundamentals
description: A comprehensive deck covering computer science fundamentals including data structures, algorithms, and complexity analysis. Perfect for interview preparation or refreshing core CS concepts.

name: JavaScript Core Concepts
description: Master JavaScript fundamentals with this deck covering closures, prototypes, async programming, and ES6+ features. Ideal for web developers looking to strengthen their JS knowledge.

name: React Hooks & Patterns
description: Learn all React hooks and common design patterns. This deck covers useState, useEffect, useContext, useMemo, useCallback, and custom hooks implementation strategies.

name: System Design Principles
description: Prepare for system design interviews with this comprehensive Anki deck. Covers scalability, load balancing, caching, database sharding, and microservices architecture.

name: TypeScript Advanced Types
description: Master advanced TypeScript concepts including conditional types, mapped types, utility types, and type inference. Great for developers looking to leverage TypeScript's type system fully.

name: Next.js & Server Components
description: Learn Next.js 14 features with a focus on React Server Components, Server Actions, and the App Router. This deck helps you understand the modern Next.js architecture and best practices.
